## `ggplot()`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot
#| fig-align: center

library(ggplot2)
```

<br>

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-example
#| fig-align: center
ggplot()
```

## `ggplot()` + data

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-data
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "2"

ggplot(
  data = penguins
)
```

## `ggplot()` + data + aesthetics

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-aesthetics
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)
)
```

## `ggplot()` + data + aesthetics + geometry

[Scatter plot]{.hi}
```{r}
#| label: ggplot-geometry
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)
) +
  geom_point()
```

## Shapes

![](img/shape.png){fig-align="center"}

## Shapes for points

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-shape
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)
) +
  geom_point(shape = 17)
```

## Shapes for aesthetics

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-shape-aesthetics
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, shape = species)
) +
  geom_point()
```

## Size

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-size
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, size = body_mass_g)
) +
  geom_point()
```

## Transparency

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-alpha
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, size = body_mass_g)
) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5)
```

## Color

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-color
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point()
```

## Manual color

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-color-manual
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "6"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#19a6b3","#f26c0d","#5e3894"))
```

## `RColorBrewer`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-color-brewer
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "1,8"

library(RColorBrewer)

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```

# Themes {background-iframe=".04_files/libs/colored-particles/index.html"}

## `ggthemes`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-color-themes
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "1,8"

library(ggthemes)

ggplot(

```

## `theme_bw()`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-theme-bw
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "7"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#19a6b3","#f26c0d","#5e3894")) +
  theme_bw()
```

## `theme_minimal()`

```{r}

ggplot(

) +

  theme_minimal()
```

# Labels {background-iframe=".04_files/libs/colored-particles/index.html"}

## `labs()` {.smaller}

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-labs
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "8-15"
#| output-location: column

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#19a6b3","#f26c0d","#5e3894")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Bill dimensions of penguins",
    subtitle = "Palmer penguins dataset",
    caption = "Source: palmerpenguins package",
    x = "Bill length, mm",
    y = "Bill depth, mm",
    color = "Species"
  )
```

# Other geometries {background-iframe=".04_files/libs/colored-particles/index.html"}

## `geom_smooth()` {.smaller}

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-smooth
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "6"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species, shape = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', se = FALSE) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Bubble plot

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-bubble
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, size = body_mass_g, color = species)
) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Bar plot

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-bar
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = species, fill = species)
) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Dodge bar plot

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-bar-dodge
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = species, fill = sex)
) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Histogram

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-hist
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3,5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Density plot

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-density
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3,5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Facets

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-facets
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5,7"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_density() +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(~ species) # or facet_grid(. ~ species)
```

## Box plot

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-box
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "5"

ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = species, y = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Box plot with jitter

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-box-jitter
#| fig-align: center
#| code-line-numbers: "3,4"

ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = species), width = 0.3, show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species), alpha = 0.5, show.legend = FALSE, position = position_jitter(width = 0.2, seed = 0)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange", "purple", "cyan4")) +
  labs(x = "Species",
       y = "Flipper length (mm)") +
  theme_minimal()
```

# ggplot2 extensions {background-iframe=".04_files/libs/colored-particles/index.html"}

## `patchwork` {.tiny}

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-patchwork
#| fig-align: center
#| output-location: column

library(patchwork)

p1 <- ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species)
) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#19a6b3","#f26c0d","#5e3894")) +
  theme_minimal()

p2 <- ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_grid(~ species)

p3 <- ggplot(
  data = penguins, 
  aes(x = species, y = body_mass_g, fill = species)
) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal()

(p1 | p2) / p3
```

::: footer
[üîópatchwork)](https://patchwork.data-imaginist.com/)
:::

## `ggstatsplot`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-ggstatsplot
#| fig-align: center

library(ggstatsplot)

ggscatterstats(
  data = penguins, 
  x = bill_length_mm, 
  y = bill_depth_mm, 
  color = species
)
```

::: footer
[üîóggstatsplot](https://indrajeetpatil.github.io/ggstatsplot/)
:::

## `GGally`

```{r}
#| label: ggplot-GGally
#| fig-align: center

library(GGally)

ggpairs(
  data = penguins, 
  columns = c("bill_length_mm", "bill_depth_mm", "flipper_length_mm", "body_mass_g"),
  mapping = aes(color = species)
)
```
